Column Comment.0: EQUIPMENT IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier for a specific peice of equipment.
Column Comment.1: EQUIPMENT BUSINESS ASSOCIATE OBSERVATION NUMBER: a unique numberassigned to this row. Note that BUSINESS ASSOCIATE is not in the PK for privacyreasons.
Column Comment.2: ACQUIRED DATE: the date this equipment was acquired or purchased.
Column Comment.3: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.4: EFFECTIVE DATE: date on which the data in this row came into effect.
Column Comment.5: EQUIPMENT BUSINESS ASSOCIATE IDENTIFIER: Identifier for the businessassociate who may be the owner or leasor or operator of a piece of equipment.
Column Comment.6: EQUIPMENT LEASED INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating that this equipment isleased.
Column Comment.7: EQUIPMENT OWNED INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating that this equipment isowned
Column Comment.8: EQUIPMENT RENTED INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating that this equipment isrented
Column Comment.9: EXPIRY DATE: Date on which the data in this row of data was no longer in effect.
Column Comment.10: FINANCE SUIMMARY IDENTIFIER: Summary information about a financialreference, such as an AFE for an activity, such as seismic acquisition or processing.Could be a cost center or any other reference number. All costs related to equipmentshould be tracked using this number.
Column Comment.11: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.12: PREFERRED NAME: Usual or identifying name assigned to this business associate,in the event that the BA is not in the validated list of names. Given as reported.
Column Comment.13: PURCHASE DATE: The date that this piece of equipment was purchased.
Column Comment.14: RELEASE DATE: The date that this equipment was sold or released by the businessassociate.
Column Comment.15: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.16: BUSINESS ASSOCIATE ROLE TYPE: The role of the business associate, such asrentor, owner, operator, authorized maintenance etc.
Column Comment.17: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.18: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.19: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.20: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.21: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.22: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.23: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.24: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
